TopicTitle: What to populate my tech tree with ?

Articles.Content:
**I have empty nodes in my tech tree**

**Can you advice me with mods to populate those empty nodes with ?** 

[![Capture_d_cran_2015_05_31_12_38_21.jpg](http://s11.postimg.org/69hz19x9v/Capture_d_cran_2015_05_31_12_38_21.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/ksp42oqen/full/)

**And this is my Mods list**

[![addons.jpg](http://s17.postimg.org/pbgydea5r/addons.jpg)](http://postimage.org/)

many great thanks ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

Hello, it seems like you have become victim of the, the more mods, the better the game. I suggest you try something new! Install OpenTree and TweakScale. Thats it. Now you can customize almost all the stock parts to your liking while getting a challenge from the new tree! Good luck

Hmm thanks for the advice but I play on carreer mode so i'd like to not start all over again. I would just like to not spend science on empty nodes.

Do you suggest i delete all my mods and install only the 2 you recommends ?

Whats would OpenTree bring me compared to CommunityTechTree ?
I recommend using the near future packs (including the dev versions) Ksp interstellar, life support, remote tech, mks/oks, atomic age. Still that survivability node stays empty for me.
